qas.question: Who is the star of Spectre?

context: <a6_0><b10_0><b12_0><b13_0><b14_0>Spectre<b14_0/><b13_0/><b12_0/><b10_0/><a6_0/> (<b11_0>2015<b11_0/>) is the <a5_0>twenty-<a7_0>four<a7_0/><a5_0/>th <a2_0>James Bond<a2_0/> film produced by <a0_0>Eon Productions<a0_0/>. It features <a1_0>Daniel Craig<a1_0/> in his fourth performance as James Bond, and Christoph Waltz as Ernst Stavro Blofeld, with the film marking the character's re-introduction into the series. It was directed by <a9_0>Sam Mendes<a9_0/> as his second James Bond film following <a3_0>Skyfall<a3_0/>, and was written by John Logan, Neal Purvis, Robert Wade and Jez Butterworth. It is distributed by <a8_0>Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Columbia Pictures<a8_0/>. With a budget around <a4_0>$245<a4_0/> million, it is the most expensive Bond film and one of the most expensive films ever made.
